Yesterday, the Mayor of Whiskerpolis contacted me to help solve a massive burglary of the National Catnip Bank. This morning, I visited the bank and got my first lead.///The teller at the counter told me they saw a gray tabby cat acting nervous the day of the crime. I found a clump of gray cat hair drifting through the lobby of the bank.///All that's left to do is to submit the hair for analysis and see who this strange gray tabby cat might be.///I put the hair sample into my bag and walk to the crime laboratory. As I enter the building, I show my credentials. Private detectives are allowed to use the lab, but it's usually reserved for the police.///'Hello. I have a sample I'd like to have analyzed,' I say. I hand over the hair clump to the laboratory technician.///'Oh, you're the Kitten Detective, aren't you? I heard the Mayor put you on the case of the missing catnip. Do you think you really have a shot at solving it?' The technician scoffs at me.///'Yes, I believe I have some good information that may lead to an arrest. Can you please analyze the sample for me?' I say, trying to put on a confident face.///'Sure, I'll analyze it for you. But you don't think the police will figure it out first? I mean, they have many more detectives on the case, not to mention a lot more funding.' The technician shakes their head.///I hadn't really thought about it like that before, to be honest. Surely the city would put their best detectives on the case, given the high-profile nature of the burglary.///I'm up against some stiff competition, and the clock is ticking fast.///'Ok, I've got the hair sample undergoing identity testing, but the results won't be available for a couple hours. I'll give you a call when I'm finished.' The technician dismisses me. And now I am stuck waiting...///To be continued!
column2303: [red]~Kitten Detective~#nl#Part 5: A Suspect![/red]///The hours were agonizing after submitting the sample to the lab. It seemed like I was losing time waiting for the results to come back. Hours felt like days as I sat in the office, contemplating my next step.///But the results did come. Sometime in the late afternoon, I received a call from the lab. They had a match. One Mr. Fluffers P. Fluffington, Jr. was an exact DNA match for the hair sample. Jackpot.///So Fluffington was the nervous cat at the bank on the day that the catnip burglary was committed. The strange behavior caught the eye of a teller, who relayed the information to me.///My next step was to figure out where I could find Fluffington so that I could interrogate him and try to get to the bottom of the mystery.///I looked up his name in my address database. Jackpot. Fluffington is living in a highrise on the west side of Whiskerpolis. It's a bit of a walk, but if I leave now, I should be able to make it before nightfall.///I know it'll be tricky to extract a confession, but I have to try. I don't know what questions I'll have to ask to get the responses I need, but I can think it through on the way. I have some time, after all.///Address in hand, I rise from my desk and step out the door. [i]This is it,[/i] I think. [i]My big break. I just have to solve this one case, and Fluffington is the key to figuring it all out...[/i]///To be continued!
column2304: [red]~Kitten Detective~#nl#Part 6: The Confrontation[/red]///Here goes nothing. I'm about to confront Fluffington, a suspect in the case of the missing catnip from the National Catnip Bank.///I've never done this sort of thing before, but I've seen enough movies that I think I know how this will go down.///I'll ask some hard-hitting questions, Fluffington will balk and get defensive, and I'll keep pressing. Fluffington will get angry.///Eventually, in a fit of rage, he'll confess to the crime. I'll smirk and walk off into the sunset. I'll call the police with what I know. I'll show them the recording. They'll arrest him. Case closed.///Of course, I know things won't be that simple in real life, but it's a nice fantasy.///I see Fluffington's highrise apartment on the horizon. I'm getting close. The sun has already set, so I'm pretty sure he'll be home. Probably just about to sit down to a nice dinner.///I approach the front door and enter the lobby. It's a working-class apartment building. I'm sure it was quite nice back when it was built, but the years have not been kind to this particular building.///I enter the elevator and press the button for the sixteenth floor. The whole place reeks of catnip.///The elevator hums a soft tune, alerting me that I've arrived at my destination. The metal doors creak open and I step out into the hallway.///Not another soul in sight. I find apartment #16B, home to one Mr. Fluffers P. Fluffington, Jr. I knock softly on the door.///Silence greets me. I knock again. Still no answer. What if he doesn't open up?///As I stand in agony, wondering what to do next, the elevator again opens its doors. A neighbor steps out, a white cat with long whiskers and a black spot on her back right foot. She's carrying a bag of groceries.///'Excuse me, miss! Do you know Mr. Fluffington, who lives here?' She looks startled, but smiles a friendly smile.///'Oh, yes! Quiet cat, stays out of the way most of the time. I'm afraid you have the wrong apartment number. Mr. Fluffington lives at the other end of the hall.' She gestures me to another door, apartment #16L.///'Thank you, ma'am. I appreciate your help.' With a friendly nod, she continues on her way. Wrong apartment number! That explains a lot. I approach apartment #16L and knock softly on the door...///To be continued!
column2305: [red]~Kitten Detective~#nl#Part 7: Checkmate[/red]///Here I stand, at the door of Mr. Fluffers P. Fluffington, Jr., a suspect in the case of the catnip burglary from the National Catnip Bank. Will I find the confession that I'm looking for inside?///I knock three times on the door and wait. There's a noise of stirring coming from inside. I hear the doorknob rattling. Suddenly, it opens.///I see Fluffington standing there, a light gray tabby cat with a startled look on his face. The undeniable stench of catnip hits me like a wave.///'Hey, who are you?' he growls. 'I'm a friend of your neighbor's. She told me you lived here and I wanted to stop by and ask a couple questions.'///I figured it would do me no good to play all my cards right out of the gate.///He grunts, then gestures with a sideways nod of his head to come in. He leads me to a small dining table in the center of the room and takes a seat on the opposite side. I sit down.///[i]Where to begin?[/i] I think, wondering what the best play would be. I got this far, so I might as well press my luck...///'Have you been following the news of the catnip burglary at the National Catnip Bank?' I ask, pointedly. If I can get him to confess, I'll have this case closed.///He smirks. 'You don't know nothing, cat,' he retorts. 'Next question.'///'What happened to all that catnip? I know you have it, or pawned it off for a huge pile of Mews!' I launch into an aggressive barrage of interrogation. It's now or never!///'If you think this is about the money, you're sadly mistaken,' he growls. 'Now, I'm going to have to ask you to leave. You're getting on my nerves.'///He stands up suddenly, and I do the same. Fluffington pushes me towards the door. And that's when I see it.///There's a closet door, slightly ajar, right next to his front door. It's dark, but I can make out the shape of a water heater in the dim space beyond. Some sort of utility closet.///And sitting in the back of the closet, I catch a glimpse of what I came for. There's a massive stash of catnip, piled high from floor to ceiling! It's crammed into every nook and cranny in the tight space.///This is no ordinary amount of catnip. It would take a cat years to consume all of that, even with the help of friends. There's no possible explanation except that this is the missing catnip from the bank.///Fluffington shoves me out the door and slams it behind me. I hear him fiddle with a heavy-sounding lock. And just like that, the interrogation is over.///But I left with all the information I need...///To be continued!
column2306: [red]~Kitten Detective~#nl#Part 8: A Conspiracy Revealed[/red]///As I run back to my office, thoughts race through my mind. I did it! I found the missing catnip stash! Fluffington is hiding it in his closet. I saw it with my own eyes.///As soon as I enter my office building, I dash for the phone and call the police. I tell them what I know, and they thank me for the information.///They assure me that they'll have Fluffington arrested within the hour if what I said is true.///Surely the Mayor will thank me for my quick work. The catnip is saved! I'm just glad that it's all still there and recoverable.///The whole city will sleep better tonight knowing that the notorious catnip bandit has been apprehended.///But my mind is still racing. What did Fluffington mean when he said that it wasn't about the Mews? What other devious purpose is behind the theft of the catnip?///It was way too much catnip for any one cat to consume, even if they had years to do it and lots of friends to help.///There's so many unanswered questions, and my curiosity is getting the better of me. Solving this case has only opened the door to a larger conspiracy...///To be continued!
column2307: [purple]Fellowship of Fellows#nl#Season 1, Episode 1[/purple]///In a far off kingdom there dwells a village of peaceful folk who want nothing more than to till their lands and be left alone. Unfortunately for them, a roving band of adventurers has just come to town.///They are the [purple]FELLOWSHIP OF FELLOWS[/purple]!///[blue]Wizard[/blue], [green]Thief[/green], [red]Archer[/red], and [orange]Knight[/orange] roam the lands in search of dungeons to plunder and coin to be won.///Our story begins at the village tavern, a place for all to gather and discuss the business of the day. Farmers speak to storehouse managers and baked goods are consumed by the dozens.///But lo! The wood door at the entryway has burst open, and the moonlight outside filters in, basking the silhouettes of four heroic figures in dust-filled light! [blue]Wizard[/blue] steps confidently into the dark room.///[blue]WIZARD[/blue]: Good evening, my fair townsfolk! I have a great hunger, for I have traveled many miles to visit your kindly village. Where might I find the tavernkeeper?///[gray]TAVERNKEEPER[/gray]: Aye, that would be me. If you're looking for the finest food in the village, you'll have to look elsewhere. But if it's an appetite you're looking to slake, my grub will get the job done.///[red]ARCHER[/red]: I'll have the... uh... Boar's Surprise? Odd name for a menu item.///[gray]TAVERNKEEPER[/gray]: Odd indeed! That's on account of the Surprise part of the meal, which I won't spoil for you. Legally speaking, I couldn't tell you what it is anyways.///[green]THIEF[/green]: Hey, fellows, are you certain this is the right place? I mean, it looks dingy enough. But I don't see any wealthy-looking patrons dripping with extra coins who would hire adventurers like us.///[gray]TAVERNKEEPER[/gray]: Oh, you're looking for a job? Something that'll pay well, I suppose?///[orange]KNIGHT[/orange]: YES INDEED, MY FAIR TAVERNKEEP! FORSOOTH, POINT ME IN THE DIRECTION OF THE NEAREST DUNGEON!///[blue]WIZARD[/blue]: Apologies for my friend, she has a hard time with volume. She means well.///[gray]TAVERNKEEPER[/gray]: Right, right. As I was saying, I know of a place where you could get all the gold coins you could ever desire...///Find out where the [gray]Tavernkeeper[/gray] sends our friends in the next exciting episode of [purple]Fellowship of Fellows[/purple]!
column2308: [purple]Fellowship of Fellows#nl#Season 1, Episode 2[/purple]///In a far off kingdom there lives a [gray]tavernkeeper[/gray] who wants to keep the peace in his small village. Unforunately for him, a roving band of adventurers is in his front parlor and won't leave him alone.///They are the [purple]FELLOWSHIP OF FELLOWS[/purple]!///[blue]Wizard[/blue], [green]Thief[/green], [red]Archer[/red], and [orange]Knight[/orange] roam the lands in search of dungeons to plunder and coin to be won.///[gray]TAVERNKEEPER[/gray]: Like I was saying, I know exactly where you can run away and find lots and lots of coins and treasure. There's some old goblin barrows at the edge of town. Rumor has it that they're teeming with wealth.///[red]ARCHER[/red]: That sounds dangerous! I assume they're also teeming with goblins?///[gray]TAVERNKEEPER[/gray]: Well, probably. We villagers don't go there often. Doesn't sound like a nice vacation spot, you know?///[green]Thief[/green]: Great! We have our first lead. Let's be off and find our treasures in the goblin barrows!///The four adventuring companions file out of the tavern. As they close the door behind them, the townsfolk erupt into a cheer.///[gray]TAVERNKEEPER[/gray]: Good riddance! We don't want any adventurers around. They only bring trouble with them. Now we'll never have to deal with them ever again. The goblins will take care of the problem for us!///Another cheer goes up. But what will become of our courageous fellowship?///Find out in the next exciting episode of [purple]Fellowship of Fellows[/purple]!
column2309: [purple]Fellowship of Fellows#nl#Season 1, Episode 3[/purple]///In a far off kingdom, four adventuring companions are riding on horses across wide meadows and dark forests in search of the ancient goblin barrows, rumored to be littered with treasure beyond compare.///They are the [purple]FELLOWSHIP OF FELLOWS[/purple]!///[blue]Wizard[/blue], [green]Thief[/green], [red]Archer[/red], and [orange]Knight[/orange] roam the lands in search of dungeons to plunder and coin to be won.///[green]THIEF[/green]: Well, what do you think? Those hills on the horizon sure look like barrows to me. Creepy.///[orange]KNIGHT[/orange]: VERILY! I DOTH AGREE WITH THINE ASSESSMENT. SHALL WE VENTURE INWARDS, MY COMPANIONS?///[blue]WIZARD[/blue]: Sure, I suppose. We came all this way. Thief, check the door for traps. You never know what those crafty goblins may have done to the place.///[green]THIEF[/green]: I don't see anything out of place. Oh, except this thin tripwire. Do you think that's important?///Thief snaps the wire with the tip of his sword, taking a swift step backwards immediately after. An arrow shoots from an unseen hiding place across the entryway of the barrow, missing the party entirely.///[green]THIEF[/green]: There we are, all disarmed! Now c'mon, we're wasting time. Think of the treasure that's waiting inside!///The four adventurers descend an ancient staircase into the hillside. Knight lights a torch and carries it at the forefront of the party.///[red]ARCHER[/red]: If we run into any trouble, we'll have a distinct advantage. After all, goblins are weak to fire spells! Everybody knows that.///[blue]WIZARD[/blue]: Would now be a good time to mention that I'm extremely scared of goblins? It's been something of a lifelong impediment for me. I can't even look at them without screaming...///Just then, a scraping noise is heard ahead in the dim tunnel! Around the stony corner, a goblin rushes forward to meet the fellows, waving a large sword!///Wizard flees, running quickly up the stairs and back to the surface, leaving the other three all alone!///[red]ARCHER[/red]: Hey, stay back! We have swords too!///GOBLIN: Oh, I'm not going to hurt you. I wanted to show off this cool sword! Nobody from the village ever comes out this far, not even to say hello. I'm very lonely, you know. Could use a friend.///[green]THIEF[/green]: Wait, you're not going to hurt us? The villagers were scared to death of you and this barrow.///GOBLIN: Nope! Nobody ever bothered to check with me when I moved in. I'd like to think I'm a nice guy. Oh hey, you all want some free stuff? There's tons of old relics to go around.///GOBLIN: Here, have some weapons and armor and gems. It's all too much for one goblin to keep without sharing with friends.///So the fellows survived the deadly barrow and left with new treasures. Find out what happens next on the next exciting episode of [purple]Fellowship of Fellows[/purple]!
column2310: [purple]Fellowship of Fellows#nl#Season 1, Episode 4[/purple]///In a far off kingdom, four adventuring companions are returning from their trip to the goblin barrows with new weapons, armor, treasures, and even a new friend.///They are the [purple]FELLOWSHIP OF FELLOWS[/purple]!///[blue]Wizard[/blue], [green]Thief[/green], [red]Archer[/red], and [orange]Knight[/orange] roam the lands in search of dungeons to plunder and coin to be won.///As they approach the town, riding mightily upon their steeds and arrayed in impressive ancient arms, the townsfolk rush out to greet them at the village gate.///[gray]TAVERNKEEPER[/gray]: Aye, you're back! So soon? I thought it would take you some time to overcome the challenges of the goblin barrows. Matter of fact, we all did.///The townsfolk are surprised to see the adventurers alive. And, to be honest, a little disappointed.///[blue]WIZARD[/blue]: Yes, we conquered the barrows and returned to town with loot!///[red]ARCHER[/red]: Well yeah, some of us conquered the barrows. As I remember it, you ran and hid as soon as you heard the first footsteps of a goblin, Wizard. Some hero you are.///[green]THIEF[/green]: The important thing is that we got rich and didn't die. Isn't that awesome? Aren't we the greatest?///Some of the townsfolk give up a half-hearted clap in response. They begin to whisper among themselves.///The devious among them are starting to plot how they can get rid of the annoying adventurers as fast as possible given that their first attempt utterly failed. What deadly trials should they suggest to the fellowship next?///Find out in the next exciting episode of [purple]Fellowship of Fellows[/purple]!
column2311: [happy][purr]#player_name#! There you are! We have a very exciting announcement to make!
column2312: [blushing]We're parents now! Isn't that amazing? We wanted to introduce you to our offspring.
column2315: [happy][purr]This is the happiest day of our lives. We will take our responsibilities as new parents seriously for the good of #colony_title_with_article#.
column2316: [blushing]Alright, we're off now to make the rounds and visit with everybody else. Take care, #player_name#!
column2318: [thinking]Oh hey, #player_name#. I wanted to stop by and ask your advice about something important...///[shocked]It's just that you've been a really good friend to me, so I trust your opinion.///[neutral]I suppose I should come right out and tell you what I've come to ask.
column2319: [blushing]Lately I've been getting to know #npc_secondary_partner_uid# pretty well. Do you think...///[shocked]Well, do you suppose I would stand a chance with #npc_secondary_partner_uid# if I asked them... well, you know... to... [red]marry me?[/red]
column2320: Go for it! You've got this!
column2329: [sad]I really thought I felt something special between #npc_secondary_partner_uid# and me...
column2330: [happy]Wow, you really think so?///[blushing]I appreciate the confidence boost. That's exactly what I needed to work up my courage.
column2331: [playful]I'm going to ask #npc_secondary_partner_uid# to marry me!!///[blushing]I'll let you know how it goes. Thanks, #player_name#!
column2332: [sad]Oh... Well, I did ask for your advice, so I should probably take it to heart.///[neutral]Sometimes all we need is a little bit of outside perspective to put everything into focus.
column2333: [thinking]I appreciate that you've told me the truth. I promise I won't bring it up again.///[sad]Perhaps you're right. Perhaps #npc_secondary_partner_uid# and I were never meant to be together...
column2335: [blushing]I asked #npc_secondary_partner_uid# to [red]marry me...[/red] and they said [b]YES!![/b] Can you believe it?
column2336: [blushing]We wanted you to be the first to know, #player_name#. I heard your advice was instrumental in bringing us together, after all.
column2337: [happy]Truth is, I had really started to fall for #npc_primary_partner_uid#, too... I was so happy when they asked the question.
column2338: [playful]We're so happy together... In fact, we're going to get married later today!///[happy]We're rounding up anyone who wants to join us for the ceremony. We'd be honored if you'd attend, #player_name#. What do you say?
column2339: Of course! I wouldn't miss it.
column2341: [neutral]Alright, that's understandable. Just figured we'd extend an invitation in case you had the time.///[happy]OK, we're off to our wedding ceremony! We'll be seeing you around, #player_name#. Thanks again.
column2342: [happy]That's wonderful! Come on, let's go tell the others and get this wedding ceremony underway!
column2343: You cannot drop another item right now because there are too many items already placed nearby! Please pick up some other items first before dropping this one.
column2344: You cannot place any more furniture right now! Please remove some other furniture first.
column2345: You cannot place any more objects right now! Please remove some other objects first.
column2346: You... I must speak with you...///You think yourself mighty... You think yourself safe... Young #player_name#...///You are not welcome here, interloper. Leave these lands or face the wrath of the Wildwood...///Your #colony_title# shall suffer if you do not heed these words...///Do not test my patience. Be gone or beware!
column2347: What a frightening dream! I should speak with the #npc_name_theforestguardian# at [red]the Temple[/red] about this...
column2350: A warning came to you in a dream. Who could be making such threats?
column2351:
Find a Dark Ruins entrance
(East Forest)
column2352: [thinking]#player_name#... You had an eerie dream as well?///[neutral]It seems the three of us all heard a similar message in our sleep...
column2353: [angry]What is the meaning of this? Are we not safe? What is to be done about these threats?
column2354: [thinking]I, too, felt a tremble of things to come, though I heard no voice.///[neutral]My counsel is this. Do not let these dark portents shake your resolve.///[thinking]To the Wildwood we have come, and here in the Wildwood we must stay.
column2355: [shocked]How can you say that? We are clearly in danger!
column2356: [playful]Have faith, my friend. I believe your dreams have confirmed my suspicion. This is where we are meant to be, danger or no danger.///[neutral]I confess, even I do not know who is sending these ominous warnings. It is imperative that we seek out additional information as quickly as we can.
column2357: [thinking]I have gazed out upon the lands of [orange]the Wildwood[/orange] and seen these mysterious structures... [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple], teeming with corruption and decay.///[neutral]Four in total stand bleakly in the area. Perhaps you have already seen one as you've roamed the land.///[neutral]I believe that we must travel to one of these [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] and look for further answers there.///[thinking]Maybe then we will discover who it is that spoke to you in your dreams.
column2358: [thinking]An excellent plan. I will spread the word to ensure that every cat of #colony_full_name_with_article# keeps an eye out for signs of danger.
column2359: [neutral]And I will stay in town to guard against any potential attacks.
column2360: [thinking]#player_name#... It is up to you to discover these [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] and investigate further.///[thinking]I have seen a [purple]Dark Ruins entrance[/purple] in the [red]East Forest[/red] region, far to the east of town. Once you arrive I will meet you there.///[neutral]Together we will surely find the answers that we need.
column2361: [neutral]Seek out the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple]. There is one I have seen in the [red]East Forest[/red] region, far to the east of town.///[thinking]Once you discover the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple], we may begin to uncover the truth behind your ominous dream.
column2362: What a strange structure! I wonder what its purpose is?///The door does not seem to open...
column2363: This [purple]Dark Ruins entrance[/purple] is sealed by a powerful magic. You must bolster the strength of your community before it will open.///You must have [orange]#required_community_points# Community Points[/orange] to enter. You currently have [orange]#have_community_points#[/orange]. Recruit more cats to #colony_full_name_with_article# at the [red]Temple[/red]!
column2365: Strengthen your community by recruiting new cats, then enter the Dark Ruins to purify them of their corruption.
column2371: [neutral]The [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] are sealed by a powerful magic. I can only break the seal once my power is bolstered by the strength of our community.///[thinking]You must work diligently to [red]recruit new cats[/red] at the [orange]Pillar of the Wildwood[/orange] here in the [red]Temple[/red]. Only then will you be able to enter the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple].
column2372: [happy]The seal upon the door to the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] in the [red]East Forest[/red] region, far to the east of town, is now broken.///[neutral]I must stay here to channel my power so that the door will remain unblocked. You must travel to the [red]East Forest[/red] region and enter the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple].
column2373: [happy]The seal upon the door to the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] in the [red]South Glade[/red] region, far to the south of town, is now broken.///[neutral]I must stay here to channel my power so that the door will remain unblocked. You must travel to the [red]South Glade[/red] region and enter the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple].
column2374: [happy]The seal upon the door to the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] in the [red]West Woodland[/red] region, far to the west of town, is now broken.///[neutral]I must stay here to channel my power so that the door will remain unblocked. You must travel to the [red]West Woodland[/red] region and enter the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple].
column2375: [happy]The seal upon the door to the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] in the [red]West Meadow[/red] region, far to the north of town, is now broken.///[neutral]I must stay here to channel my power so that the door will remain unblocked. You must travel to the [red]West Meadow[/red] region and enter the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple].
column2377: You have confronted the Wildwood Champion and brought peace to the region.
column2379: It is time to take the fight to the Wildwood Champion in their hidden lair...
column2380: [thinking]Now that the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] have all been purified, the path to the hidden lair of our enemy has at last been revealed.///[thinking]It is time to take the fight to the [orange]Wildwood Champion[/orange]. Use these stairs to enter the [purple]sunken temple below[/purple] and put an end to their evil deeds.///[shocked]I will remain here to hold open the passage for your return. Go, #player_name#! Fight for #colony_full_name_with_article#!
column2382:
Purify the Temple of
the Wildwood Champion
column2383: [thinking]You have done well, #player_name#. This is one of the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] I spoke of.///[neutral]Can you not feel the malevolent energy that radiates out from these cursed stones?///[thinking]Yet once this was a structure of great beauty, filled with light and life... How did it become so dim?///[neutral]Perhaps the entity that spoke to you in your dream is somehow connected to the darkness of this place. Who is behind all of this?///[neutral]I suspect we will find the answers to these questions inside. Now then, pay close attention to the door.
column2384: [angry]There is some sealing spell at work upon the entryway. A powerful magic protects the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] from intrusion.///[thinking]In time, I may be able to temporarily [red]ward off the sealing spell[/red] to allow you to enter the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] and investigate. However, I confess that its power is very great.///[thinking]How then shall we open the door?
column2385: [thinking]Not to worry. I believe I have an idea.///[neutral]My strength is bolstered by the cats of #colony_full_name_with_article#. When our community grows, so too does my power.///[happy]The bonds shared between mortal cats... Friendships, families... That is the well from which I drink.
column2386: [happy]We will break the seal that has been placed upon this door. Together.///[neutral]Not by my power alone, but by the strength that lies in the hearts of every cat of #colony_full_name_with_article#.///[thinking]#player_name#... Do you remember what I showed you at the [orange]Pillar of the Wildwood[/orange] in the [red]Temple[/red]? You must use it to find new cats to recruit to #colony_full_name_with_article#.///[happy]By recruiting new cats, we will build enough power to enter the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple]. Let this be our highest priority.
column2387: [neutral]I will inform you when our [orange]community[/orange] has grown strong enough to break the seal. At that time, you must return here.///[happy]You have always led #colony_full_name_with_article# with dignity and honor. I trust you will continue to do what is right for our people.
column2388: [playful]I sense that our [orange]community[/orange] has grown stronger...
column2389: The seal upon the door of the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] has been broken! You may now enter when you are ready.///What mysteries await inside?
column2390: [thinking]#player_name#... You have returned from the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple].///[neutral]The scouts report that the [purple]Dark Ruins entrance[/purple] in the [red]East Forest[/red] region has... changed. It seems somehow less defiled and more approachable.///[shocked]I trust you had something to do with this? What did you encounter inside?
column2391: [thinking]What a troubling mystery... Once, long ago, there were many cats who dwelt in the Wildwood under the protection of a powerful spiritual guardian, not unlike our #colony_title#.///[thinking]It is likely that these cats are the ones who constructed the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple], though I sense that they were not originally places of darkness and decay.///[neutral]However, the Wildwood was thought to be deserted over a hundred years ago. I have not heard of any cats living here in the past century.///[thinking]Perhaps the Wildwood was not altogether abandoned...
column2392: [neutral]The powerful celestial being who once guarded this region was known as [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange]. While we never met, I had heard them to be noble and courageous.///[shocked]Could it be that the shapeshifter you encountered in the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] and [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange] are one and the same?///[thinking]No... Surely it is not possible...
column2393: [shocked]Wait, assuming your theory is correct... if this [orange]Wildwood Champion[/orange] is as powerful as you say, what hope do we have of defeating them?
column2394: [thinking]It is too early to say... But I believe that we stand a chance if we band together as a community.///[neutral]We know that our enemy is a powerful shapeshifter capable of extraordinary feats. We know they are working against us. But we must learn more about our mysterious foe.///[thinking]#player_name#... you must continue to investigate.///[neutral]Continue to seek out [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] to purify of corruption, and continue to recruit new cats so that our community will be both safe and strong in the face of such an adversary.
column2395: [thinking]These [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] are full of many riddles.///[neutral]Well done, #player_name#. Your report on the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] in the [red]South Glade[/red] region has shed new light on the schemes of our adversary.///[thinking]You say that our enemy shapeshifted into a massive beast... and yet you were able to defeat them. Fascinating.
column2396: [neutral]It seems that we have learned something of our enemy's past. The information gathered from this conquered [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] points to a long period of grief and mourning.///[thinking]To dwell for so many years in such a state of perpetual sadness... Perhaps that is what transformed them into the monster they are today. A shapeshifter, indeed.///[neutral]In any case, our foe has once again fled. We must continue to investigate if we are to learn more about our adversary and make safe the Wildwood for #colony_full_name_with_article#.
column2397: [neutral]I have felt a change in the fabric of the world. The [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] in the [red]West Woodland[/red] region is now purified, is it not?///[thinking]Let us review what you learned there. Over long years of solitude and misery, our enemy became embittered and lonely.///[shocked]It appears in their isolation our foe conceived of the voidling cats, a semblance of the community they lost...
column2398: [neutral]Yet the voidling cats are only a shadow of what once was. They are fragments of the mind of our enemy, cast forth into the world to do the dark bidding of their creator.///[thinking]Within each voidling cat lies the unhappiness and cruelty of its maker.
column2399: [thinking]Once again, you have done excellent work in gathering this knowledge, #player_name#. But we must not let our guard down.///[neutral]Continue to seek out new information so that we can put an end to the threats that surround #colony_full_name_with_article#.
column2400: [angry]You have returned from the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] in the [red]West Meadow[/red] region, and your report is most troubling, #player_name#...///[shocked]Are you certain of the facts which you have shared?
column2401: [angry]That monster destroyed our home! They are the cause of the destruction of the first [red]Temple[/red] before we came here to the Wildwood...///[sad]How could anyone commit such an evil deed? We must soon put a stop to the wickedness of our enemy.
column2402: [shocked]Yes, it is alarming indeed that our enemy is so powerful. And there can be no doubt that their actions are wicked.///[thinking]But note, #player_name# and #npc_name_coco#, that we have learned something of great value about our foe...
column2403: [neutral]Upon moving here to the Wildwood, we were threatened through your dreams unless we moved on immediately.///[thinking]Does this not imply that our foe did not expect us to come here? The shortsightedness of our adversary is the very thing that brought us to their doorstep.///[neutral]It seems that our enemy has a marked lack of foresight. Their actions speak of spite, not strategy.///[thinking]Our rival was jealous of what we had... nothing more. Perhaps we can use their poor planning against them.
column2404: [happy]Yes... It is so.///[playful]I do not believe in coincidence! I knew in my spirit that we were meant to come here. Did I not say so from the start?///[neutral]It is our destiny to deal with this enemy and make safe the Wildwood once more. We must work diligently to remove the stain of their corruption from the region.///[happy]Let us continue to work toward that noble goal.
column2405: [neutral]You have done admirably, #player_name#. All four [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] have been purified of their corruption.///[playful]The surface of the Wildwood is now free of their evil influence. Now that these ruins are places of light once more, a change has occurred in the cosmic realm...
column2406: [thinking]More strongly than ever, I can sense the mind of our enemy. There can be no doubt that the shapeshifter you have repeatedly encountered is, in fact, [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange], a great spirit that was once the guardian of these lands.///[sad]Troubling it is for one so powerful to be brought to darkness and doubt. This fallen spirit must answer for their actions, once and for all.///[neutral]Deep within their darkest sanctum, [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange] broods. I now perceive where they are hiding...
column2407: [thinking][orange]The Wildwood Champion[/orange] hides themself within their forgotten Temple of old, sunk deep below the earth by a spell of concealment.///[neutral]Now that the four [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] have been reverted to their former state, the sorcery that holds us at bay has begun to weaken. I can now open a path to the [red]Temple of the Wildwood Champion[/red].///[thinking]Strange though it may seem, this evil lair can be found directly below my own [red]Temple[/red]. An irony that is no doubt not lost on [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange].///[neutral]Merely another omen that proves that we were destined to come here.
column2408: [playful]I will hold the passageway so that you may enter the [red]Temple of the Wildwood Champion[/red]. You must journey down the stairs and enter that abyssmal place.///[neutral]Gather what strength you may. Our adversary will not be able to run this time. Like a cornered animal, you may find that they fight with a newfound ferocity.
column2409: [sad]It saddens me to think that one of my kind could become so destructive. #player_name#... If you see any way... Please help [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange] to see the truth.///[thinking]If not... then they have sealed their own fate. The Wildwood will be better off without their further interference.
column2410: [thinking]We are all counting on you. Go, #player_name#, and confront [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange] to bring lasting peace to the Wildwood in any way that you can.///[thinking]I trust that you will do what you must.
column2411: [white]This is the way to the[/white] [red]Temple of the Wildwood Champion[/red][white]... You should be well prepared before you enter.[/white]///[white]Descend the dark stairs?[/white]
column2413: [happy]Hear my voice, cats of #colony_full_name_with_article#! Today we have great cause for celebration.///[playful]By the efforts of #player_name#... The Wildwood has been made safe!
column2414: [thinking]Our enemy, [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange], has been vanquished. Their corrupting influence is gone from these lands, once and for all.///[neutral]Now the Wildwood is on a new path. A path towards healing. A path towards prosperity for every living cat who calls this place home.
column2415: [neutral]Our community has overcome so much. From our wandering days to the first sunrise over our new settlement, never has the future been more bright than it is today.///[thinking]But there is still work to be done. Our foe lingered long in the Wildwood, filling it to the brim with disease and decay.///[neutral]We will continue our labors to heal the region and purify it of the stench of corruption. Weed out the darkness wherever you may find it.
column2416: [happy]But never give in to despair! We are a people of hope. We have proven that we can stand strong in the face of any opposition.///[neutral]If any of you should ever doubt... Look to #player_name# for inspiration. This #leader_title# has set an example for us all.///[playful]Let us all cheer for #player_name#, vanquisher of the darkness! Let us all cheer for #player_name#... #leader_title# of #colony_full_name_with_article#!
column2417: [thinking]#player_name#... you have done very well. You have led your #colony_title# with honor and justice.///[neutral]All those among the spirit-folk, those of my kin, shall never forget what you have accomplished here today. You are a great and noble cat.///[happy]While we are no longer in direct danger from [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange]... you may still find things to do in the Wildwood.///[neutral]If you ever need advice... or simply a friend to listen... you will always know where to find me.
column2418: [happy]Hear my voice, cats of #colony_full_name_with_article#! Today we have great cause for celebration.///[playful]By the efforts of #player_name#... The Wildwood has been restored!
column2419: [neutral]#player_name# descended to the darkest fortress of our adversary and put an end to the threats of [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange].///[playful]And by some incredible twist of fate... #player_name# was able to not only stop our enemy, but to also arrive home with an unlikely ally.///[happy]I speak, of course... of [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange].
column2420: [playful]Return to us now, kindly champion of old... Put the past behind you and come as you once were, as even now you truly are.///[happy]Shed your fierce disguise and be among us, freed at last from the chains of loneliness and grief. Come!
column2421: [neutral]#player_name#... Cats of #colony_full_name_with_article#... I cannot begin to explain... how sorry I am for what I have done.///[neutral]In my isolation I became a monster... #player_name# helped me to see the light once again.///[neutral]I have caused so much harm to each and every one of you... If you despise me now, I cannot hold it against you. I know the trouble I have created.///[neutral]There can be no excuse for my actions. Know this, cats of #colony_full_name_with_article#... with every ounce of power that remains within me, I will work to undo the evils I have wrought.///[neutral]In time... I hope I will earn your forgiveness. If not... then at least I will have tried. I must try.
column2422: [neutral]Through the power of our unshakeable bonds, we have proven that together we can master any challenge.///[neutral]Today, we welcome a new member into our community. One whose past is irrevocably tied to our future.///[happy]Thanks to the mercy of #player_name#... We welcome the #npc_name_thewildwoodchampion#.///[playful]Let us all cheer for #player_name#, hero of the light! Let us all cheer for #player_name#... #leader_title# of #colony_full_name_with_article#!
column2423: [thinking]#player_name#... you have done very well. You have led your #colony_title# with compassion and grace.///[neutral]All those among the spirit-folk, those of my kin, shall never forget what you have accomplished here today. You are a great and noble cat.///[happy]Working in unison with our new friend, the #npc_name_thewildwoodchampion#... you may still find things to do in the Wildwood.///[neutral]As for my part... If you ever need advice... or simply a friend to listen... you will always know where to find me.
column2424: Congratulations! You have completed the [red]Main Story[/red]! But there is still plenty to do...
column2425: All [purple]Voidling Cats[/purple] will now have their [red]health greatly reduced[/red].
column2426: The #npc_name_thewildwoodchampion# has joined #colony_full_name_with_article#! You can speak with them in the [red]Temple[/red].
column2427: [gray](You've unlocked a new [red]accessory[/red]! You can equip it in the [red]#accessories_title#[/red] menu within the [red]#coat_studio_title#.[/red])[/gray]
column2428: Once there were many. Now there are none. The Wildwood has gone silent.///The secrets of the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] shall not be revealed to those who have not proved their worth. Solve the puzzle if you wish to venture further.
column2429: Nothing remains but the memories of their presence... I have failed them all.///The haunted feeling will not go away. It must go away! They have all gone away...///I will make it end.
column2430: They are gone... Each and every one of them... They have all been lost. How can a path forward be found now?///It is a winding, dangerous road...
column2431: You... interloper! You dare come to this dark place? For what reason?///I once knew many mortal cats. I do not wish to look upon your kind any more. Your wretched little #colony_title# must depart the Wildwood or be driven out.///As for you... #player_name#... you will never leave this chamber.
column2432: Don't you understand? You are doomed!///I will see to your destruction personally...
column2435: The [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] has been purified! Your enemy has fled.///You should go to the [red]Temple[/red] to give everyone an update...
column2436: Now I am alone... My very existence is puzzling.///I cannot put the pieces in order. Will I ever be able to do so?///The secrets of the [purple]Dark Ruins[/purple] shall not be revealed to those who have not proved their worth. Solve the puzzle if you wish to venture further.
column2437: All possible futures seem to quickly go wrong. What will become of me? A guardian with nothing left to guard...///If I make a wrong move, will I need to start over?
column2438: My mind is a tangled, twisting place... I cannot seem to follow the threads of my thoughts.///Lost! All is lost...
column2439: 1. The [purple]Circle[/purple] cannot neighbor the [purple]Diamond[/purple].///2. The [purple]Paw[/purple] reaches for the [purple]Diamond[/purple], but it is too far away to grab.///3. The [purple]Star[/purple] appears before the [purple]Circle[/purple].///4. Neither the beginning nor the end holds the [purple]Paw[/purple].
column2440: 1. Every [purple]Circle[/purple] must neighbor a [purple]Star[/purple].///2. No [purple]Diamond[/purple] may appear to the right of any [purple]Circle[/purple].///3. There are twice as many [purple]Diamonds[/purple] as there are [purple]Stars[/purple].///4. A [purple]Paw[/purple] is in the leftmost place.///5. There is only one [purple]Star[/purple] and only one [purple]Paw[/purple].
column2441: This place is filled with many memories... Grief... Sorrow... Mourning...///Why must you meddle where you do not belong? Do you believe it will bring you victory? That is not possible for a mortal such as you.///Even an immortal cannot succeed in all their endeavors.///I will make you see!
column2442: Your efforts are futile...///You will drown in woe as I have! Drown, drown, drown!
column2443: You feel healing energies radiating from this odd inscription...///Your health has been fully restored!
column2444: What is to be done now that I am alone? I yearn for subjects and vassals...///I will send forth shadows unto the world. Shadows of my thought and of my power...
column2445: I will create them as I am. They shall be strong and unyielding. They shall be vessels of my will.///And in memory of those who once lived here, they shall take the form of mortal cats...
column2446: Let all those who oppose me fear my armies! They arise even now in great numbers.///No living thing shall encroach upon the Wildwood while I still dwell here. I am its rightful ruler!
column2447: Has my message been unclear? You are not welcome here, #player_name#.///I have set my [purple]voidling cats[/purple] against your pathetic #colony_title#... My armies are unending. You cannot hope to defeat them.///They are like unto the cats who once dwelled here many long eons ago... Yet I have perfected them. My [purple]voidlings[/purple] do not tire or weaken with age. They feel no remorse or guilt.
column2448: I will summon the [purple]voidling cats[/purple] to my aid...///We are a swarm! You cannot hope to match our numbers! Together, we will destroy you...
column2449: Anger... It burns within me like a furnace. It bellows forth in great rivers of flame...///I rage at the injustices of the world. My fate is undeserved!
column2450: I put forth my power to locate those who live in comfort far away from here... In happy woodlands and meadows I found them.///I will shatter their illusions of peace. All must suffer as I have suffered.
column2451: In hatred I tore down their sacred place. A great earthquake I summoned to shake their resolve.///Their guardian will feel now as I have felt...///And yet, I am still void. The anger does not fade. The fire will not die...
column2452: You come to challenge me? It amuses me that you still do not understand.///It was I who summoned the power to destroy your old home... It was I who brought ruin upon your people and upon your lands!///What a tragic twist of fate that you ended up here, in the Wildwood, in my dominion... I wish it were not so.///I am destruction! I am rage! Yet you still believe that you stand a chance against my might.///If I cannot be content with my lot... Why should you be allowed to live in peace? Why should anyone?///It angers me to think upon it!
column2453: I will strike your name from history. In time, none shall remember you, #player_name#...///They shall forget you as they have all forgotten me!
column2454: I will hide myself from the world... This merciless, unjust world that has conspired against me and those I once loved...///None shall ever again walk these sacred halls. They belong to those who are now gone. Gone forever...///Far below the surface they shall descend so that none may discover my failure.
column2455: I loved them! I truly loved them all... Yet I was unable to prevent their decline.///For a century I have yearned for closure, yet none has ever come. Will I live with this guilt for the rest of eternity?
column2456: I have stretched out my power to strike at those who still possess what I now lack.///What a foolish notion, to think that tearing others down could resolve my consternation.///I could not bear to look upon their satisfaction from afar any longer...
column2457: Something has changed in the antechamber! You have come one step closer to confronting [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange]...
column2458: We meet for the final time, #player_name#. One of us will not leave this room. There will be no running or escape this time. Such a thing is not possible.
column2459: Foolish #player_name#... Did you believe that confronting me in my own sanctum would be easy? No... In this place, I am at my most powerful.///Put aside any faulty notion of victory. This ends here!
column2460: You... You do not understand!///All mortal cats will one day die. All of spirit-kind must linger on forever. In time, all shall become like me...
column2461: I see the truth!///This is the future...///The future that you fight. Yet the passage of time cannot be halted...///Let it burn your heart to ashes, as it once did mine.
column2462: What?? You... you still fight on?///How can this be?
column2463: We are not so unalike, #player_name#... We are both too stubborn for our own good.///What you do not realize is... much like me... you are alone. It is the burden of leadership...///Yet what is a leader without someone to follow? Look what has become of me...
column2464: [neutral]#player_name#... You must not listen to these lies...///[thinking]You are not alone. Your #colony_title# has gathered... in the [red]Temple[/red]...///[neutral]They offer you... their strength. You and your struggle... is foremost... in our thoughts...///[neutral]Together... Our community... Will overcome... Don't give up!
column2465: Enough talk! I will end this!
column2466: No! I cannot believe it...///How could a mortal cat... Defeat... Me??///What have I done? I cannot fight... any longer. I... surrender...
column2467: [thinking]There is nowhere left to run. #player_name# and #colony_full_name_with_article# are victorious over you.///[neutral]You have done much that is evil. Yet I sense within you a spark of penitence. Why did you attack us when we could have simply spoken?///[thinking]In your sadness, you led yourself astray. It did not need to come to this.
column2468: When I gazed upon your #colony_title#... I saw what I have lost. Love... Friendship... Community...///In my jealousy and pride... I let my anger engulf me. I did what was evil.///I am too far gone... Once it started, I could not reverse course. I believed... up until now... that I was unstoppable. That I could not be proven wrong.///Yet the fruit of my deeds is plain to see. I have caused you great suffering when you did no wrong against me.
column2469: I do not ask for your understanding or forgiveness. A monster such as me is undeserving of such mercies.///I submit myself to your judgment. Were our roles reversed... I know what I would choose.
column2470: [thinking]#player_name#... #leader_title# of #colony_full_name_with_article#... the choice is yours.///[neutral]Before us stands a humbled creature. A powerful spirit whose crimes against us brought many trials and great pain.///[thinking][orange]The Wildwood Champion[/orange] seems aware of their own guilt, yet this does not erase the impact of their wicked actions.///[neutral]If left to their own devices, I do not believe our foe would ever again dare to cause us injury.
column2471: [neutral]What, then, is to be done with [orange]the Wildwood Champion[/orange]? Consider your verdict carefully and I will carry it out. The choice is yours and yours alone, #player_name#.
column2474: Can it be..? After all I have done..?///Perhaps my evil... may one day... be undone...
column2475: At long last... my hatred... is washing away...///I am undone!
column2476: [thinking]Let us leave this dark place behind and forget the memories it holds.///[neutral]#player_name#... Your #colony_title# is waiting...

column15: Ersetzt die standardmäßige, handgezeichnete Textschriftart durch eine einfache serifenlose Alternative (Serifenlos).
column17:
Wenn AN, wird dein Charakter automatisch laufen, wenn er sich bewegt.
Standard: AUS
column19: [gray](Du hast einen Gegenstand erhalten! [green]#item_added#[/green] wurde zu deinem Inventar hinzugefügt.)[/gray]
column20: [gray](Du hast einen Gegenstand erhalten! [green]#item_added#[/green] wurde zu deinem Lager hinzugefügt, da dein Inventar derzeit voll ist.)[/gray]
column29: Die folgenden Mods konnten aufgrund von Dateikonflikten nicht geladen werden:
column92: Anpassen, wie die GUI angezeigt wird, wenn das System angedockt ist.
column96: Wenn AN, wird dein Fortschritt jedes Mal automatisch gespeichert, wenn du schläfst. Wenn AUS, musst du deinen Fortschritt entweder an einem Bett oder über das Pausenmenü manuell speichern.
column98: Du kannst deinen Fortschritt derzeit oder von diesem Ort aus nicht speichern! Versuche es später erneut.
column100: Fortschritt speichern? Wenn du dein Spiel lädst, wirst du zu deiner Höhle zurückkehren, aber dein Fortschritt wird gespeichert.
column114: [happy]Das ist wunderschön. Was wirst du damit machen?
column120: Spende alle benötigten Gegenstände, um diese Katze für #colony_title# zu rekrutieren!
column121: Du trägst diesen Gegenstand momentan nicht bei dir! Du kannst keinen Gegenstand spenden, wenn du ihn nicht in deinem Inventar hast.
column122: Du hast diesen Gegenstand bereits gespendet!
column128: Aber sie brauchen einen Ort zum Leben ... lasst uns ihnen ein neues Zuhause bauen!
column129: Platziere die folgenden Gebäude, um fortzufahren: [red]#building_list#[/red]
column130: Du hast [purple]Gartenarbeit[/purple] freigeschaltet! Du kannst jetzt den [red]Garten[/red] benutzen, um frische Kräuter und Blumen anzupflanzen.///Bitte platziere den [red]Garten[/red] an einer beliebigen Stelle, um fortzufahren.
column131: Du kannst die [red]Saatgutmaschine[/red] verwenden, um frische Kräuter in Samen umzuwandeln, die im Garten gesät werden können.///Bitte platziere die [red]Saatgutmaschine[/red] an einer beliebigen Stelle, um fortzufahren.
column132: [neutral]Unsere Gemeinschaft wird mit jeder neuen Katze in der Bewohnerschaft stärker. Das hast du gut gemacht, #player_name#.
column133: [happy]Es ist gut, zu feiern, dass #colony_title# gesund ist und wächst. Hervorragende Arbeit, #player_name#.
column134: [thinking]Wir waren noch nie so stark wie heute, dank deiner Bemühungen, #player_name#. Lass uns weiter hart arbeiten für das Wohl unserer Gemeinschaft.
column135: [playful]Jede neue Katze der Bewohnerschaft ist wie ein einzelner Stein, der in eine mächtige Mauer gelegt wird. Zusammen geben wir uns gegenseitig Bedeutung und Zweck.
column136: [happy]Deine Arbeit wird heute belohnt, #player_name#. Wir heißen alle Neulinge mit offenen Herzen und offenen Armen willkommen.
column137: [playful]Oh ja, eine [green]#curio_name#[/green]! Ich kann mit größtem Vertrauen sagen, dass ich genau weiß, was das ist ...
column138: [neutral]Da hast du es. Ich werde deine Spende sofort zur Galerie hinzufügen. Das [purple]Museum[/purple] dankt dir für deine Unterstützung.///[thinking]Hast du heute noch weitere [green]Kuriositäten[/green] zu spenden?
column139: [neutral]Da hast du es. Ich werde deine Spende sofort zur Galerie hinzufügen. Das [purple]Museum[/purple] dankt dir für deine Unterstützung.///[thinking]Wenn du weitere [green]Kuriositäten[/green] findest, denke bitte daran, sie dem [purple]Museum[/purple] zu spenden!
column140: [shocked]Oh! Das ist deine [purple]dritte Kuriositätsspende[/purple]!///[thinking]Ich habe eine [rainbow]besondere Belohnung[/rainbow] für dich aufbewahrt ...///[playful]Es ist ein [green]Wandteppich[/green]! Diese Wanddekoration wurde seit Jahrhunderten weitergegeben. Ich vertraue darauf, dass du gut darauf aufpasst, #player_name#.///[neutral]Du hast dem [purple]Museum[/purple] einen großen Dienst erwiesen. Es ist wirklich das Mindeste, was ich tun kann, um deine Großzügigkeit anzuerkennen.
column141: [shocked]Oh! Das ist deine [purple]zehnte Kuriositätenspende[/purple]!///[thinking]Ich habe eine [rainbow]besondere Belohnung[/rainbow] für dich aufbewahrt ...///[playful]Es ist eine [green]antike Tafel[/green]! Dieses glorreiche Artefakt trägt eine seltsame Inschrift. Ich vertraue darauf, dass du gut darauf aufpasst, #player_name#.///[neutral]Du hast dem [purple]Museum[/purple] einen großen Dienst erwiesen. Es ist wirklich das Mindeste, was ich tun kann, um deine Großzügigkeit anzuerkennen.
column142: [shocked]Oh! Das ist deine [purple]zwanzigste Kuriositätsspende[/purple]!///[thinking]Ich habe eine [rainbow]besondere Belohnung[/rainbow] für dich aufbewahrt ...///[playful]Es ist ein [green]Kuriositäten-Verdichter[/green]! Diese Handwerksstation kann verwendet werden, um unerwünschte Kuriositäten in nützliche Gegenstände umzuwandeln. Ich vertraue darauf, dass du gut darauf aufpasst, #player_name#.///[neutral]Du hast dem [purple]Museum[/purple] einen großen Dienst erwiesen. Es ist wirklich das Mindeste, was ich tun kann, um deine Großzügigkeit anzuerkennen.
column143: [shocked]Oh, ha ha! Endlich! Die [purple]Museumsgalerie ist vollständig![/purple] Gut gemacht, #player_name#. Sehr gut gemacht.///[happy]Alle 30 [green]Kuriositäten[/green] sind nun fröhlich zur Schau gestellt.///[playful]Zum letzten Mal danke ich dir für deine Unterstützung. Du bist jederzeit willkommen, die [purple]Galerie[/purple] zu durchstöbern und die Früchte deiner Arbeit zu betrachten.///[thinking]Endlich ist meine Lebensmission - alle bekannten menschlichen Artefakte zu sammeln - abgeschlossen. Jetzt muss ich eine neue Aufgabe finden.///[playful]Aber zuerst willst du sicherlich deine [rainbow]Belohnung[/rainbow], oder? Du hast eine verdient, #player_name#!///[happy]Ich habe diese [rainbow]Regenbogen-Power-Pfote[/rainbow] für diesen bedeutenden Anlass aufbewahrt. Sie gehört jetzt dir, #player_name#. Herzlichen Glückwunsch.
column144: [thinking]Dieses biegsame Metall wurde von Menschen verwendet, um ihr Kopfhaar hochzuhalten.///[shocked]Einige menschliche Frisuren waren ziemlich komplex und erforderten, dass Menschen Hunderte davon gleichzeitig tragen!
column145: [neutral]Die Länge dieses seltsamen Objekts entspricht fast genau der Länge, die wir für den menschlichen Mund halten.///[thinking]Vielleicht hielten die Menschen diese Dinge in ihrem Mund, um zu verhindern, dass ihr Speichel an den Seiten entweicht? Sicherlich sind wir der Wahrheit nahe.
column146: [thinking]Was für ein seltsames kleines Stückchen Flaum. Es ist nicht essbar und scheint für die Menschen zu klein zu sein, um irgendeine reale Funktion zu erfüllen.///[shocked]Dieses Objekt erfordert weitere Untersuchungen, um seinen wahren Zweck aufzudecken!
column147: [happy]Ah, das ist ein Zehenmassagegerät! Im Gegensatz zu unseren nützlichen Pfoten hatten Menschen lange, hässliche Zehen an ihren Vorder- und Hinterpfoten.///[neutral]Sie würden die Spitzen dieser Zehen mit diesem zylindrischen Gerät massieren.
column148: [happy]Ein Schredderspielzeug! Das ist es, was Menschen ihren Kätzchen - oder besser gesagt, Kindern - geben würden.///[thinking]Diese Spielzeuge gab es in vielen lustigen Farben und Formen für die Kinder, um sie mit ihren Nägeln zu zerreißen.///[neutral]Ich habe Berichte gelesen, die darauf hinweisen, dass diese Schredderspielzeuge oft Beute enthielten, aber ich habe noch nicht gelernt, was einst darin enthalten war.
column149: [neutral]Dieses elastische Gerät würde verwendet werden, um ein Bündel von Gegenständen wie Kunstbedarf zusammenzuhalten.///[thinking]Beachte, dass Menschen, obwohl sie begriffsstutzig sind, eine große Stärke und große Muskeln besitzen.///[neutral]Es erfordert eine große Anstrengung, dieses Band zu dehnen. Für einen Menschen viel einfacher als für eine Katze, das versichere ich dir.
column150: [angry]Vorsicht! Das ist sehr gefährlich.///[angry]Menschen würden das zur Einschüchterung verwenden. Die hohen Töne des Knirschens reichen aus, um jeden abzuschrecken.///[shocked]Ich werde vorsichtig mit diesem Artefakt umgehen. Du hast gut daran getan, es mir zu bringen. Ich werde sicherstellen, dass es nie wieder für das Böse verwendet wird!
column151: [thinking]Ah, ein abgefallenes Stück des Außenfells.///[neutral]Menschen haben nur begrenztes Fell auf ihrem Körper. Sie müssen Außenfell benutzen, um sich zu bedecken, sonst würden sie frieren.///[playful]Brauche ich Außenfell? Natürlich nicht. Ich bin nicht so schwach wie ein Mensch!
column152: [neutral]Menschen würden mehrere dieser seltsamen Objekte aneinanderreihen und sie dann um ihren Hals tragen.///[thinking]Sie würden diese Halsketten an andere Menschen als Geschenke verteilen, zweifellos um den Empfänger dem Geber gegenüber verpflichtend zu machen. Ein seltsamer Weg, um Freunde zu gewinnen, würdest du nicht zustimmen?
column153: [neutral]Dies ist Kratzpapier. Menschen würden ihre Krallen - oder besser gesagt, Nägel - darauf kratzen und es in Fetzen reißen.///[sad]Sie haben auch seltsame Symbole auf die Oberfläche geschnitzt ... Ich werde mich bemühen, dieses Dokument sorgfältig zu übersetzen. Vielen Dank, dass du es mir gebracht hast.
column154: [neutral]Menschen tragen diese immer bei sich in der Tasche als eine kleine Belohnung. Sie reiben das süße Wachs auf ihre Zunge.///[sad]Leider gibt es keinen bekannten Weg für uns Katzen, das Siegel zu öffnen und selbst zu kosten. Es wurde für menschliche Hände gemacht, nicht für Katzenpfoten.
column155: [shocked]Ah, der berühmte Spiegel. Menschen schauen stundenlang hinein und studieren ihr eigenes Spiegelbild.///[angry]Solch ungebremste Eitelkeit! Es ist eine Lektion für uns alle.
column156: [thinking]Ein Käferquetscher! Menschen würden dies auf den Boden werfen und es an den Wänden oder der Decke abprallen lassen, um alle Insekten an der Wand zu zerquetschen.///[neutral]Eine ziemlich geniale Erfindung, besonders für die normalerweise einfältigen Menschen.
column157: [neutral]Dies ist ein einfaches Baumaterial. Menschen würden ihre Häuser daraus bauen.///[playful]Dumme Menschen! Bäume sind perfekte Unterschlüpfe, ohne sie zu fällen und in schwache kleine Stöcke wie diese zu verwandeln.
column158: [blushing]Das ist wunderschöne Kunst. Manchmal machen Menschen Dinge einfach nur zum Anschauen. Ist es nicht eine elegante Skulptur?
column159: [shocked]Pass auf die Spitze auf! Der weiche rosa Teil wurde hier verwendet. Der Zweck des geschärften Endes ist derzeit unbekannt.///[neutral]Menschen würden den rosa Teil verwenden, um nach dem Essen ihre Zähne zu reinigen. Es wurde unter den Menschen gesagt, dass es alle übrig gebliebenen Essensreste ''löschen'' könnte. Was für ein seltsamer Glaube.
column160: [playful]Dies ist offensichtlich eine gefälschte Klaue. Menschen hatten leider keine eigenen Klauen.///[neutral]Aufgrund dieses Unglücks mussten sie solche Fälschungen wie diese herstellen! Wie traurig es gewesen sein muss, ein Mensch zu sein.
column161: [neutral]Auf der Oberseite einer Geschenkschachtel platziert, sollte dieses Artefakt den Inhalt der Schachtel vor denen schützen, die das Geschenk stehlen würden, bevor es verschenkt und ausgepackt wurde.///[happy]Natürlich konnte dieses alberne Gerät nichts dergleichen bewirken. Warum bestanden sie dann darauf, es auf jedes Geschenk zu legen? Die Menschen und ihre seltsamen Bräuche ...
column162: [angry]Das ist eindeutig ein Fäustling. Lass dich von der Weichheit nicht täuschen! Dies wurde als Strafe verwendet.///[shocked]Menschen konnten ihre Pfoten nicht benutzen, wenn sie gezwungen wurden, diese für ihre Verbrechen zu tragen.
column163: [playful]Verlockend, nicht wahr? Schau, wie glänzend es ist! Sicherlich verspürst du auch den unwiderstehlichen Drang, damit herumzufuchteln.///[thinking]Es heißt, dass die Menschen, als sie einst Katzen wie dich und mich gefangen hielten und in ihren Häusern leben ließen, diese Spielzeuge aufstellten, um die Katzen zum Spielen zu verleiten.///[sad]Sobald man sie jedoch von ihrem Platz entfernte, wurden die Menschen böse! Offensichtlich waren sie Teil einer rituellen Prüfung.
column164: [neutral]Allzweckwerkzeuge. Die meisten Menschen trugen eine Handvoll dieser Metallstücke jederzeit in ihren Taschen.///[thinking]Was jedoch im Laufe der Zeit verloren gegangen ist, ist das Wissen darüber, welche Probleme diese Gegenstände lösen sollten. Vielleicht werden wir durch sorgfältige Studien in der Lage sein, ihren Zweck zu erforschen.
column165: [thinking]Legenden erzählen von einem köstlichen weißen Trank, den die Menschen in gallonengroßen Krügen aufbewahrten. Zu besonderen Anlässen teilten sie vielleicht ein bisschen von dieser leckeren Flüssigkeit mit ihren Lieblingskatzen.///[neutral]An den Krügen waren diese Kunststoffpreise befestigt, direkt unter dem Deckel.///[angry]Die Menschen waren oft zu einfältig, um zu bemerken, dass diese Gegenstände überhaupt existierten, und sie warfen oft die leeren Krüge mit diesen unbezahlbaren Artefakten, die immer noch daran befestigt waren, weg. Wie barbarisch!
column166: [thinking]Ein albernes Gerät, das Menschen benutzten, um Flüssigkeiten von einer Servierschale in ihren Mund zu befördern.///[neutral]Warum sie das taten, bleibt ein Rätsel, da sie perfekt funktionierende Zungen hatten, mit denen sie ihre Getränke problemlos aufschlecken konnten, wenn sie es gewollt hätten.
column167: [thinking]Legenden erzählen von einem verbotenen Kratzbaum, einem Objekt, das so perfekt zum Schärfen deiner Krallen ist, dass Menschen sie in kleinen Räumen einsperren würden, um Katzen wie dich und mich draußen zu halten.///[angry]Ein echter verbotener Kratzbaum würde seine weiche weiße Hülle enthalten. Dies sind lediglich die Überreste eines Kratzbaums, der aufgebraucht und nun nicht mehr funktionstüchtig ist.
column168: [thinking]Diese seltsamen Objekte sehen aus und schmecken wie Holz, riechen aber oft süß wie Früchte.///[shocked]Welche mystischen Kräfte erlaubten es den Menschen, diese Artefakte mit solch mächtigen Düften zu versehen?
column169: [neutral]Ein zeremonielles Gerät, das Menschen außerhalb ihrer Kleidung tragen würden, um ihren Status zu zeigen.///[thinking]Je mehr schwere Kugeln an dem Ring befestigt waren und je lauter sie klingelten, desto mächtiger wurde der Mensch wahrgenommen.
column170: [happy]Dies ist offensichtlich eine Feder, ähnlich die eines Vogels.///[shocked]Es ist jedoch derzeit unbekannt, warum Federn wie diese so häufig in der Nähe verlassener menschlicher Behausungen entdeckt werden.///[thinking]Haben Menschen heimlich Federn gezüchtet und vor uns Katzen versteckt? Eines Tages werde ich alle ihre Geheimnisse kennen!
column171: [neutral]Ein vielseitiges Ausrüstungsstück. Das Loch in der Mitte und das dehnbare Material ermöglichen es einem Menschen, es um einen Arm, ein Bein oder sogar um den Hals als eine Art engen Halsreif zu tragen.///[thinking]Wie konnten sie jemals der Versuchung widerstehen, damit zu spielen und damit herumzufuchteln?
column172: [thinking]Ein seltsames Objekt, zweifellos als modisches Accessoire gedacht. Diese besonderen Bänder wurden jedoch nie getragen, sondern einfach an Wänden oder Regalen platziert.///[shocked]Warum sollten die Menschen eine so farbenprächtige Schleife kreieren, wenn nicht zum Tragen? Es verwirrt den Verstand.
column173: [shocked]Was für eine seltsame Kreatur! Sie hat einen Schwanz und einen Körper, aber keine Augen. Menschen pflegten diese als Haustiere auf ihren hohen Tischen zu halten.///[thinking]Menschen waren bekannt dafür, diese Kreaturen stundenlang zu verwöhnen.///[shocked]Es lässt einen darüber nachdenken, warum man all diese Zuneigung geben sollte, wenn es so scheint, dass diese undankbaren Kreaturen diese nie zurückzugeben?
column182: Freundschaftspunkte sind einfacher mit allen Kolonie-Katzen zu erhalten.
column183: Kampfkatzen aus deiner Kolonie erhalten zusätzliche Trefferpunkte.
column184: Alle Katzen deiner Kolonie erhalten Bonuspunkte, wenn EP gewonnen wird.
column185: Ein Maß für die gefangenen Nahrungsreserven deiner Kolonie.
column186: Ein Maß für die geernteten Waren deiner Kolonie, einschließlich Kräutern, Blumen und Beeren.
column187: Ein Maß für den angesammelten Reichtum und die Luxusgegenstände deiner Kolonie.
column188: Ein Maß für den Holzvorrat deiner Kolonie. Wird für Bauprojekte verwendet.
column189: Ein Maß für den Steinvorrat deiner Kolonie. Wird für Bauprojekte verwendet.
column190: Ein Maß für den Sandvorrat deiner Kolonie. Wird für Bauprojekte verwendet.
column192: Möchtest du den Gegenstand [green]#item_name#[/green] spenden, um deinen Vorrat um [black]#item_sell_price#[/black] zu erhöhen?
column194: Alle deine Gegenstände spenden? (Einige Gegenstände können nicht gespendet werden und bleiben in deinem Inventar.)
column195: Im Moment gibt es nichts, was du spenden kannst!
column196: Dieser Gegenstand kann nicht gespendet werden.
column202:
Bauprojekte

Sieh dir verfügbare Bauprojekte an und gib deine Vorräte aus, um sie zu erwerben.
column207: Möchtest du [red]#project_cost#[/red] ausgeben, um [purple]#project_name#[/purple] zu bauen?
column209: Du kannst den neuen [purple]Tunneleingang[/purple] über das Baumenü an beliebiger Stelle in der Stadt platzieren. Besuche den [red]Gründerstein[/red], um auf das Baumenü zuzugreifen.
column210: Du kannst dir dieses Bauprojekt nicht leisten! Du musst zuerst deinen [purple]Lagerbestand[/purple] erhöhen.
column211: Lagerbestände sind eine abstrakte Darstellung der verfügbaren Ressourcen von #colony_title#.///Ein gut gefüllter Lagerbestand kann #colony_title# und allen Mitgliedern mehrere starke Vorteile bieten oder dir ermöglichen, spezielle Verbesserungen zu bauen.///Sobald ein Lagerbestand bis zu oder über seinem täglichen [red]Verbrauch[/red] gefüllt ist, werden die Ressourcen verwendet und der zugehörige Vorteil wird für den Rest des Tages aktiviert.///Wenn ein Lagerbestand einen höheren Wert als seinen täglichen Verbrauch hat, bleibt der Rest für den späteren Gebrauch erhalten.///Zu Beginn eines jeden Tages wird ein Lagerbestand automatisch um seinen [red]Verbrauch[/red] reduziert und sein Vorteil aktiviert, falls möglich.///Einige Lagerbestände haben keinen zugehörigen Vorteil und werden nicht für einen täglichen Verbrauch genutzt. Stattdessen werden sie für Bauprojekte verwendet.///Es gibt zwei Möglichkeiten, den Wert eines Lagerbestands zu erhöhen: [purple]Spenden[/purple] und [purple]Trupp-Zuweisungen[/purple].///Erstens, kannst du bestimmte Gegenstände aus deinem persönlichen Inventar [purple]spenden[/purple]. Eine [green]Maus[/green] kann beispielsweise gespendet werden, um den Wert des Beutelagerbestands zu erhöhen.///Zweitens, kannst du einen [purple]Trupp[/purple] in eine Region schicken, die von #colony_title# derzeit kontrolliert wird. Am Ende des Tages kehrt der Trupp mit den Ressourcen zurück, aus dem bewachten Gebiet, das dem Trupp zugeordnet ist.
column212: Sprich mit #npc_name_talon#, um [purple]Trupps[/purple] zuzuweisen.///Je mehr sich #colony_title# ausdehnt, desto einfacher wird es, Ressourcen für deine Lagerbestände zu sammeln. Viel Glück!
column213: Du wirst später [purple]Trupp-Zuweisungen[/purple] freischalten, wenn du weiterhin neue Katzen rekrutierst. Viel Glück!
column214: [green]Kuriositäten[/green] sind seltsame Objekte, die die meisten Katzen faszinieren.///Du kannst [green]unidentifizierte Kuriositäten[/green] an verschiedenen Orten in der Welt finden: in den Minen, in bestimmten Geschäften, sogar auf dem Boden verstreut.///Bring deine [green]unidentifizierten Kuriositäten[/green] hierher, um sie identifizieren zu lassen. Eine identifizierte [green]Kuriosität[/green] kann behalten oder dem Museum gespendet werden.///#npc_name_glimmer#, die Museumsleitung, wird sich freuen, eine [green]Kuriositäten[/green]-Spende entgegenzunehmen, sofern sie noch nicht gespendet wurde.///Es wird sicherlich Belohnungen für diejenigen geben, die viele [green]Kuriositäten[/green] spenden.///Kannst du jedes [green]Kuriositäten[/green]-Exemplar entdecken und spenden?
column216:
Kaserne-Upgrade I

Erweitere deine Kaserne, um jeden Tag 1 zusätzlichen Trupp zuweisen zu können.
column218:
Kaserne-Upgrade II

Erweitere deine Kaserne, um jeden Tag 1 zusätzlichen Trupp zuweisen zu können.
column220:
Kaserne-Upgrade III

Erweitere deine Kaserne, um jeden Tag 1 zusätzlichen Trupp zuweisen zu können.
column222:
Verfeinertes Streu

Nach Fertigstellung dieses Projekts erhältst du jedes Mal, wenn du eine Aufgabe abschließt, +1 Aufgaben-Token als Bonusbelohnung.
column224:
Robuste Meißel

Nach der Fertigstellung dieses Projekts werden Diamanten beim Abbau auf Ebenen, auf denen Diamanten gefunden werden können, häufiger vorkommen.
column226:
Kultivierung

Nach Fertigstellung dieses Projekts werden die meisten Kräuter, die in den Gebieten deiner Kolonie wachsen, Rang ★★ haben.
column228: Nach Fertigstellung dieses Projekts erhältst du Bonus-EP und heilst zusätzliche Herzen, wenn du in deinem Bett schläfst.
column230:
Jagd-Lehrbuch

Nach Fertigstellung dieses Projekts wird legendäre Beute häufiger in den Territorien deiner Kolonie erscheinen.
column232:
Tunnel: Nordwesten

Nach Fertigstellung dieses Projekts, kannst du einen Tunnelzugang in deiner Stadt platzieren, der dich sofort nordwestlich in die Region ''Dickicht-Bauten'' teleportiert.
column234:
Tunnel: Nordosten

Nach Fertigstellung dieses Projekts, kannst du einen Tunnelzugang in deiner Stadt platzieren, der dich sofort nordöstlich in die Region ''Westliches Vorgebirge'' teleportiert.
column236:
Tunnel: Südwesten

Nach Fertigstellung dieses Projekts, kannst du einen Tunnelzugang in deiner Stadt platzieren, der dich sofort nach Südosten in die Region ''Kleines Flusstal'' teleportiert.
column238:
Tunnel: Südosten

Nach Fertigstellung dieses Projekts, kannst du einen Tunnelzugang in deiner Stadt platzieren, der dich sofort in den Südosten zur Region ''Westliche Ödlande'' teleportiert.
column251:
Gegenstände spenden

Wähle Gegenstände aus deinem Inventar aus, um sie den Vorratslagern der Kolonie zu spenden.
column252:
Hilfe

Erfahre mehr darüber, wie Kolonie-Vorratslager funktionieren.
column253: Das [purple]Beute-Vorratslager[/purple] hat seinen Verbrauch erreicht! Sein Bonus wurde für den Rest des Tages aktiviert und sein Wert um [black]#prey_stockpile_burn_rate_value#[/black] verringert.
column254: Das [purple]Kräuter-Vorratslager[/purple] hat sein Verbrauch erreicht! Sein Bonus wurde für den Rest des Tages aktiviert und sein Wert um [black]#herbs_stockpile_burn_rate_value#[/black] verringert.
column255: Das[purple]Schatz-Vorratslager[/purple] hat seinen Verbrauch erreicht! Sein Bonus wurde für den Rest des Tages aktiviert und sein Wert um [black]#treasure_stockpile_burn_rate_value#[/black] verringert.
column291: An diesem Tag gibt es keine Ereignisse.
column300: Du hast momentan keine [green]unidentifizierten Kuriositäten[/green] zu identifizieren!
column303: Du kannst im Moment keine [green]Kuriositäten[/green] mehr identifizieren, da du nicht genug Platz in deinem Inventar hast! Versuche zuerst einige Gegenstände loszuwerden, um Platz zu schaffen.
column305: Du kannst dieses Rezept nicht nutzen, da du die richtigen Zutaten nicht in deinem Inventar hast!
column306: Du kannst dieses Rezept nicht nutzen, da die Voraussetzungen nicht erfüllt sind!
column309: Du kannst dieses Rezept nicht nutzen, da du nicht genügend Platz in deinem Inventar hast, um den produzierten Gegenstand zu platzieren! Versuche zuerst einige Gegenstände loszuwerden, um Platz zu schaffen.
column313: Ändern der Sprache, die für den gesamten Text verwendet werden soll.
column321: Passe die Gesamtlautstärke des Spiels an.
column325: Passe die Lautstärke der Soundeffekte an.
column327: Schalte an, ob Soundeffekte für Miauen, Fauchen und Schnurren der Katze abgespielt werden sollen oder nicht.
column362: Ein üppiger Teppich aus gesundem Gras.
column364: Blättriges Gras, das auf einem schlammigen Boden wächst.
column366: Warmer Sand, der vom Wind zu Wellen geformt wird.
column370: Dunkler Felsen aus einer vulkanischen Einöde.
column372: Dichtes, zerklüftetes Gestein aus dem Hochland.

column384: Welche Anzahl von #item_name# möchtest du verkaufen?
